thread.title: Cozy and well located hotel
thread.title_full: Cozy and well located hotel - Review of Hotel Roma Sacre Coeur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: soha_11
title: Cozy and well located hotel
text: Paris can be a charming place or just another ugly big city so picking up a hotel is one of the factors that can make your visit a nice one. This hotel has a nice location walking in different you are distance from vital areas and you have cafes, restaurants just few steps away. Bus station juts a cross the road. The staff were friendly and helpful the room is clean cheerful with comfortable bed.
